channel.title: ★ Project Nibiru ★ Seeking BETA Testers [Open BETA]
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w421/accerado/Niburu_logo_zps2p9naucf.png[/img]
[u][b]About Project Nibiru[/b][/u]
Our #1 goal as a team is to provide an astonishing highly efficient, quality built, content-packed server, that ensures every player satisfaction. We're a player based RSPS, we strongly recommend players, and staff to give us feedback, and suggestions/concepts, this helps shape your world. With a strong economy, lists of things to do, obtainable's to obtain, Quests to accomplish, and unique features that brings the community together. This will definitely be a long-term project, as it already has been. This project is extremely stable, and should run perfectly fine for anyone. We also have a dedicated Support Team in case anyone has any issues. Right now we are currently under a strict Open-BETA Stage. [B]Nibiru is a non-profit RSPS, founded by the Nibirian Team.[/B] We strive to push out daily updates and constant progression. We've put a lot of time in ensuring this is stabilized, quality-packed, & efficiently developed with access to see Behind the Scenes Development, for those of you who're interested. We are really seeking to have more BETA players come and play! [b][u]We have ALOT of insane content being worked in that is going to turn heads.[/u][/b]
[B][U]Note: Everyone who participates in the BETA stage, will receive the following bonuses once we launch:[/B]
- An additional spin spin a day - A unique rank and title, to show off - 10m GP
[u][b]Some Features:[/b][/u] RS3 Map Sprites DropID Lookups Rune-Span Blast-Mining (being worked in) A couple Quests Client is highly stable, and the cache is really clean Client Zooming Sheathing Mod Finder Account Security Advanced Agility Courses Warrior Guild Rise of Six Fist of Guthix Our own custom Mini-game (doesn't really have a name yet) Skill-fu Soul Wars Bank Pins Loyalty system Botany Bay Master Capes AI Bar System Shooting Stars Living Rock Caverns Resource Dungeons Tool-belt Clue Scrolls Clans Loot beams Effigies The Evil Tree Sinkholes Skilling Tasks New Prayer Book look (also other stuff) Boss Raids Cosmetics Globalized Strong Economic System 22 Bosses (Some OS bosses being worked in for those OS fans) 13 Mini-Games Penguin Hide n' Seek All skills work - (Construction is under development) Boss Pets Off-Hands Weapons KillStreak system PvM system Player Referral System (Rewards for bringing players in)
[spoiler=Media] [img]http://i67.tinypic.com/5kq7g2.png[/img] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/l8rqo.jpg[/img] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/2eygeud.png[/img] [img]http://i64.tinypic.com/2romeir.jpg[/img] [img]http://i68.tinypic.com/ap7o8m.jpg[/img] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/2lo5b8i.png[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/whjiwi.jpg[/img] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/11uakcy.png[/img] [img]http://i64.tinypic.com/2ltkgb5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/2yozor9.png[/img] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/o0bfnl.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=NEW Media:]
[img]http://i66.tinypic.com/97vezc.png[/img] [img]http://i68.tinypic.com/ng5bt4.png[/img] [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/ddj5f6.png[/img] [img]http://i68.tinypic.com/aowepi.png[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/4r5dtk.png[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/rtq4xz.png[/img] [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/nojatg.png[/img] [img]http://i67.tinypic.com/2hefw3c.png[/img] [img]http://i64.tinypic.com/mw7abn.png[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/2znxseb.png[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/19t9x2.png[/img] [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/ipqcyo.png[/img] [img]http://i68.tinypic.com/105b8nr.png[/img] [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/idfwg7.png[/img] [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/1zntxmo.png[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/2llfvib.png[/img] [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/2eusi6w.png[/img] [img]http://i64.tinypic.com/rv93qq.png[/img] [/spoiler]
Links: [URL=http://s15.zetaboards.com/ProjectNibiru/index]Homepage[/URL] - [URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/dh1e8uxfncqpb58/Nibiru.jar?dl=0]Play now[/URL]
[/CENTER]

please fix it.

item.title: ★ Project Nibiru ★ Seeking BETA Testers [Open BETA]
item.dc:creator: @Project_Nibiru Project Nibiru
item.description:
@Project_Nibiru wrote:

Soulcist:

Why are you using a free forum? A domain nowadays are like below five dollars for a cheap host and to purchase a domain (in most cases). You could even use like SMF (the same software MSCP is using)…

Due to low funds, we pay for everything out of pocket. We’ve been working on our website design. It’s coming soon.

Read full topic

item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

We have now entered Alpha-Beta Stage. We’re going to be introducing some pretty exciting a huge features, including quests. We have already added some. I have a bit of updates to post, but I am going to hold off a couple more days.

Bump.

item.title: ★ Project Nibiru ★ Seeking BETA Testers [Open BETA]
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[quote=“Project Nibiru, post:8, topic:555207”]Crystal Chests have now been added!

I am going to wait a couple days to post the rest of the update log.

I will be uploading a load of new media when I post the next update log.
We’ve decided now is the time, we’re going to start trying to get noticed.
I highly encourage everyone to come and give Nibiru a go.
We are packed full with content, and it’s just going to keep coming.
Every single day we are progressing. We would like to see some more players in-game![/quote]

Bump

Read full topic

item.title: ★ Project Nibiru ★ Seeking BETA Testers [Open BETA]
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[quote=“Project Nibiru, post:6, topic:555207”][quote author=Virtu link=topic=674134.msg4507339#msg4507339 date=1461288187]
Bump. Great guy, really puts in the hard work to make the server the best it could possibly be. Good luck
[/quote]

Thank you for the feedback. Means a-lot from you.
Will be posting Development Logs at the end of the day.
In the mean time BUMP, we’ve done a load of updates![/quote]

4/19/2016 - 4/27/2016
Development Logs:

Added Dragon SQ Shield Creation
Added some voices to NPC Dialogues
Added Dart Posioning (All Darts can be poisoned)
Added Javelin Poisoning (All Javelins can be poisoned)
Added Strange Skull creation, Runed Sceptre creation, and Skull Sceptre creation
Added Orb of Oculus (fully functional)
Added Yoyo (fully functional)
Added Marionette Dolls (fully functional)
Made all Jars functional (hunter)
Added Ring of Dueling Teleports
You can now Preach all of the God Books
Added Stronghold of Player Safety
Added Jadinko Lair (With Woodcutting, Firemaking, Fletching, and added item creations)
Added Favour Point System
Added Favour Point System Store
Added Juju Spiritbag
Added Bag of Fruits
Added Bag of Seeds
Added fully functional Trollheim

Read full topic

item.title: ★ Project Nibiru ★ Seeking BETA Testers [Open BETA]
item.dc:creator: @Project_Nibiru Project Nibiru
item.description:
@Project_Nibiru wrote:

[b]Bump.

Blaze’s Development Log #1
4/15/2016[/b]

[ul][li]Rolled back to the old source/client, using a new cache[/li]
[li]Added RS3 Map Icons[/li]
[li]Added our own Prayer Book[/li]
[li]Added some new interfaces[/li]
[li]Updated the Game Client Background, as-well as Client Icon[/li]
[li]Created & added 16 new NPC Dialogues[/li]
[li]Disabled ::bank and bank button in the Control Panel[/li]
[li]Added Desert Bandit Camp NPC’s[/li]
[li]Added Al-Kharid City NPC’s[/li]
[li]Starting working on Recommendation System[/li]
[li]Starting working on Skilling Task System[/li]
[li]Started touching up on Referral Rewards[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: ★ Project Nibiru ★ Seeking BETA Testers [Open BETA]
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[CENTER]

About Project Nibiru

Our #1 goal as a team is to provide an astonishing highly efficient, quality built,
content-packed server, that ensures every player satisfaction.
We’re a player based RSPS, we strongly recommend players, and staff to give us feedback,
and suggestions/concepts, this helps shape your world.
With a strong economy, lists of things to do, obtainable’s to obtain,
Quests to accomplish, and unique features that brings the community together.
This will definitely be a long-term project, as it already has been.
This project is extremely stable, and should run perfectly fine for anyone. We also have a
dedicated Support Team in case anyone has any issues.
Right now we are currently under a strict Open-BETA Stage.
Nibiru is a non-profit RSPS, founded by the Nibirian Team.
We strive to push out daily updates and constant progression.
We’ve put a lot of time in ensuring this is stabilized, quality-packed, & efficiently
developed with access to see Behind the Scenes Development, for those of you who’re interested.
We are really seeking to have more BETA players come and play!
We have ALOT of insane content being worked in that is going to turn heads.

[U]Note: Everyone who participates in the BETA stage, will receive the following bonuses once we launch:

  • An additional spin spin a day
  • A unique rank and title, to show off
  • 10m GP

Some Features:
RS3 Map Sprites
DropID Lookups
Rune-Span
Blast-Mining (being worked in)
A couple Quests
Client is highly stable, and the cache is really clean
Client Zooming
Sheathing
Mod Finder
Account Security
Advanced Agility Courses
Warrior Guild
Rise of Six
Fist of Guthix
Our own custom Mini-game (doesn’t really have a name yet)
Skill-fu
Soul Wars
Bank Pins
Loyalty system
Botany Bay
Master Capes
AI Bar System
Shooting Stars
Living Rock Caverns
Resource Dungeons
Tool-belt
Clue Scrolls
Clans
Loot beams
Effigies
The Evil Tree
Sinkholes
Skilling Tasks
New Prayer Book look (also other stuff)
Boss Raids
Cosmetics
Globalized
Strong Economic System
22 Bosses (Some OS bosses being worked in for those OS fans)
13 Mini-Games
Penguin Hide n’ Seek
All skills work - (Construction is under development)
Boss Pets
Off-Hands Weapons
KillStreak system
PvM system
Player Referral System (Rewards for bringing players in)
